Admin/Version_History.title: Version History
Admin/Version_History.sqlselect: select %%%SQLFIELDS%%% from ({schema}.audit_history({schema}.version, '{schema}_version', version_id, ["version_component","version_no_major","version_no_minor","version_no_build","version_no_rev","version_sts","version_note"]) where version_id=@version_id) version_history %%%SQLSUFFIX%%%
caption: Version
Versions
